oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ICROFS news 3-4/2014 - newsletter from ICROFS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Skovsbøl, U.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: - Rewarding cross-Atlantic cooperation - Future CORE Organic Funding to be decided - New methods can reveal organic food fraud - ICROFS put food security on the agenda in Istanbul - Heated debate on organic farming - New project provides knowledge on how agro-ecology can norish the World - Hay-milk is suitable for high-quality cheese - Proteins from organic grown green crops are promising poultry feed - Parasitic Worms - a challenge in organic pig production - Organic diets are equally good for Rainbow trout fry as conventional diets
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Skovsbøl, U. (2014) ICROFS news 3-4/2014 - newsletter from ICROFS. ICROFS news, December 2014, 4, pp. 1-15.
